page.title: 11THE LIFE OF A LOLLIPOP LADY.
page.content: Mrs. Ayres is our lollipop lady. We call her a lollipop lady because in her job as a Saftey Patrol Officer she wears a yellow hat, a white coat with a yellow stripe and carries a sign shaped like a lollipop. On a school day Mrs. Ayres gets up at seven o'clock. She has a breakfast of toast and marmalade. She leaves the house and travels to school on a scooter. She arrives at eight thirty. Her first job then is to change into her special clothes. She wears these so that the traffic will recognise her and will stop to let the children cross the road safely. When she has her clothes on she switches on the warning lights which are situated a hundred metres or so on either side of the school. These warn motorists to slow down. She then waits for the children to arrive.
